items.sentence: Tom had been released from the hospital, but he was still recovering from the gunshot wound.
Tom has a brother and a sister. His brother lives in Boston and his sister lives in Chicago.
Children often want to do things that are dangerous without knowing that they are dangerous.
I met Tom before I graduated from high school, but didn\'t meet Mary until many years later.
It\'s often said the best way to learn a foreign language is to learn from a native speaker.
Theoretical physics was child's play to Einstein, but he couldn't figure out his income tax.
Mary traveled into the future and found that climate change had destroyed all life on Earth.
I'd rather live in a world full of secrets than one so small that I'm able to understand it.
Tom has been going out with Mary ever since they met at a fourth of July picnic last summer.
The reason Mary has to go to the bathroom so often is that she drinks ten cups of tea a day.
